all.Title: All

github-copilot.Title: GitHub Copilot
github-copilot.Description: Master GitHub Copilot, your AI coding companion. Discover features, tips, and real-world insights to supercharge your development workflow.

Collections.Title: News
Collections.Description: GitHub Copilot news from their official product updates.

Collections.Title: Blogs
Collections.Description: A collection of blogs that are worth your while.

Collections.Title: Videos
Collections.Description: Practical video tutorials and demonstrations showing GitHub Copilot features, workflows, and real-world coding scenarios.

Collections.Title: Community
Collections.Description: Community articles, announcements, discussions and insights related to GitHub Copilot.

Collections.Title: Features
Collections.Description: GitHub Copilot features and capabilities overview, including demo videos.

Collections.Title: Visual Studio Code Updates
Collections.Description: Fokko Veegens showing you all the latest features of each Visual Studio Code release.

Collections.Title: Levels of Enlightenment
Collections.Description: Rob Bos's comprehensive guide to mastering GitHub Copilot through progressive learning stages.

Collections.Title: The GitHub Copilot Handbook
Collections.Description: A practical guide by Rob Bos and Randy Pagels to transforming the software development lifecycle with GitHub Copilot.
